name: core-registry-api
description: Combined Carbon Core Registry API Application

scripts.create-win-x64-dist: npm run prepare-binary && pkg package.json -t node18-win-x64 --out-path dist
scripts.create-mac-x64-dist: npm run prepare-binary && pkg package.json -t node18-macos-x64 --out-path dist
scripts.create-linux-x64-dist: npm run prepare-binary && pkg package.json -t node18-linux-x64 --out-path dist
scripts.create-linux-arm64-dist: npm run prepare-binary && pkg package.json -t node18-linux-arm64 --out-path dist

author: Michael Taylor
